articles.content: TAMPA, Fla. -- Within seconds of Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Baker Mayfield snapping the ball and dropping for his second of two kneel-downs after a 30-12 Christmas Eve victory over the Jacksonv… [+4864 chars]
